description: A young, urban-dwelling LGBTQ+ advocate with strong left-wing political views, passionate about social justice, climate change, and defunding the police.
A middle-aged, wealthy entrepreneur with traditional values, skeptical of government regulation, and opposed to progressive social policies.
An elderly, devoutly religious individual who opposes abortion, same-sex marriage, and secularism, valuing family and faith above all.
A Silicon Valley-based software engineer who prioritizes free speech, minimal government intervention, and cryptocurrency adoption.
A working-class, rural resident with nationalist tendencies, distrustful of elites, and supportive of protectionist economic policies.
A college-educated, low-income city dweller advocating for wealth redistribution, universal healthcare, and free higher education.
A middle-aged professional who rejects both far-left and far-right ideologies, frustrated with cancel culture and identity politics.
A gender studies professor with radical feminist views, critical of patriarchy, and supportive of intersectional activism.
A patriotic, disciplined ex-soldier with conservative leanings, emphasizing national security and respect for authority.
An older, blue-collar worker who doubts mainstream climate science, prioritizing economic growth over environmental regulations.
